summary: Retextured the Robe for the Mages. The Mod is changeable to all 3 Variants
descriptionHtml:
SINCE I ADDED A NEW FILE WITH SOME CHANGES THIS ONE HERE WILL BE DELETED SOON


Update 1.5 Thanks to Chachanshenlee (http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?/user/3430425-chachanshenlee/) i managed 2 add a non enchanted version into Toldfrs shop at the Mage College, so Kudo the shit out of him.
If u want a entchanted version u have 2 replace a existing robe with the textzures from teh first file.
The 1.5 File is Female ready, so if u want 2 make/add a female version, pm me adn i will send u the files.

______________________________________________________________________________________

This Retexture is a work for self-statifaction and its my very first texture mod.
Since i find the Arch Mage Robe ugly at finest and i dont wanted to play with armor; i decided it was time 2 retexture a robe.
SInce i aimed for high quality It was a lot more work that i thought and even with some tricks the gold lines took forever to do.
And since i did it for myself, why not share when its done.


Stuff:

Its only for Male (since i play male)
 and female isnt included, if some wants 2 make a female send me a pm (expierenced users[texture mod released]may get the psd for use).

Its not 100% done since some things bug me and not all textures are altered (not sure if keep at it or not)

I may add a female version myself but dont count on that hard.
I might change all 3 Robes if this get enough Endorsments and enough people beg for it^^.


My Requests:

It would be Nice if someone is able to clean the dirt from the normal maps.
I have no clue how 2 do it and would really appreciate that.

It would be very nice if some knew how to add this Robe as a 4th Variant ingame (only buy able at shops) so it player exclusive.[enchented versions pls like the normal robes [enchantments respond 2 player lvl]]
Pls pm me if u can do it!!!


Installation:

Just simply copy the Data folder into ur skyrim folder.
I suggest NMM for easy in- and deinstallation.

It can replace all the Robe Variants in play.
I changed the Apprentice robe (robe_variant1), for the Adapt robe rename the file simply to \"...2\".
and for the novice robe just \"robe\" is enough (same system on hood).

So thats it, if u like it endorse it pls.

Donkalleone
author: DonKalleOne
